data.text: @Dominic_Giroux @HSN_Sudbury @PublicHealthSD @GreaterSudbury Saw your interview on CTV. U are all a bunch of liars. Your eye language gave it away. Never seen anyone blink so much when they have to lie to the camera. And let’s be real, a positive PCR has NOTHING to do with pandemic. U know it, I know it, we all know it. “Pandemic” is over!

@Dominic_Giroux @HSN_Sudbury @PublicHealthSD @GreaterSudbury As I experienced yesterday, current HSN mask policy coerces patients and visitors into removing N-95 masks and replace them with surgical masks upon entry. Covid is airborne. This policy helps spread covid. Please fix this.
@EvHanson2 @imgrund @Dominic_Giroux @HSN_Sudbury @PublicHealthSD @GreaterSudbury Maybe masks are just for show.
@Dominic_Giroux @HSN_Sudbury @PublicHealthSD @GreaterSudbury Hold a trucker convoy, that worked in Ottawa.
@imgrund @Dominic_Giroux @HSN_Sudbury @PublicHealthSD @GreaterSudbury And this is with people wearing masks!
@Dominic_Giroux @HSN_Sudbury @PublicHealthSD @GreaterSudbury Sudbury R value up to 1.1. Expect hospitalizations to continue to increase for at least a week to come.

@Dominic_Giroux @HSN_Sudbury @PublicHealthSD @GreaterSudbury Sudbury has been a disaster since day 1.  People up there have the same tools as we do in southern Ontario and don’t care about protecting themselves
